DOC.brief_title: The Effect Food Administration Canagliflozin Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This single-center , single-dose , open-label ( volunteer know identity assign treatment ) , randomize ( one 2 study drug sequence assign chance ) study evaluate oral bioavailability ( degree drug absorb body take orally mouth ) canagliflozin take without food healthy volunteer . Healthy Volunteers take 1 canagliflozin tablet orally 1 day 2 treatment period ( canagliflozin take food 1 treatment period canagliflozin take without food 1 treatment period ) ; 2 treatment period separate 10- 14-day washout period .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer body mass index 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) body weight less 50 kg current medical illness deem clinically significant Investigator ( study physician )
